DOC.brief_summary: This experiment seek determine whether individual PD benefit vitamin B6 ( pyridoxine hydrochloride ) , B12 ( cyanocobalamin ) , Folic Acid supplementation , whether benefit 6-week circuit training program , whether benefit combination two intervention . The outcome variable include : plasma homocysteine , GSH : GSSG ratio , cognitive function , balance , strength , functional activity , kinematic gait analysis , quality life questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin B6 , B12 , Folic Acid Exercise Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Individuals Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) high risk death coronary artery disease stroke ( Gorell , Johnson , & Rybicki , 1994 ; Postuma & Lang , 2004 ) . Seventy percent people PD suffer dementia cognitive impairment . Decreased level B vitamin link increased level homocysteine ( protein produce body ) directly link heart disease , cerebrovascular accident , dementia , impaired cognitive function ( Miller et al. , 2003 ; Postuma & Lang , 2004 ) . Normalizing level homocysteine B vitamins body show reduce risk disease improve cognitive performance ( Miller et al. , 2003 ; Morris , 2003 ) . Levodopa therapy , use treat individual PD , cause elevated homocysteine level ( Blandini et al. , 2001 ; Miller et al. , 2003 ; Postuma & Lang , 2004 ) . The mechanism behind elevated homocysteine relate vitamin B status ( Miller et al. , 2003 ; Postuma & Lang , 2004 ) . L-dopa undergoes O-methylation reaction produce s-adenosylhomocysteine ( SAH ) . SAH hydrolyze form homocysteine . Therefore , L-dopa require 0-methylation , homocysteine produce . Once homocysteine produce , get metabolize back methionine cysteine . In order metabolize methionine cysteine , Vitamin B6 , B12 Folate need . If homocysteine metabolize , accumulate body , create dangerous level ( Miller et al. , 2003 ; Postuma & Lang , 2004 ) . Undergoing levodopa therapy impair homocysteine metabolism rather cause increase homocysteine synthesis , exceed body 's ability metabolize . Thus , level Vitamin B12 Folate need high individual levodopa therapy order contend need great homocysteine metabolism ( Miller et al. , 2003 ) . There ample experimental support B vitamin supplementation reduce homocysteine level population ( Lamberti et al. , 2005 ; Miller et al. , 2003 ; Postuma & Lang , 2004 ; Zoccolella et al. , 2005 ) . Supplementing B12 ( cyanocobalamin ) Folic Acid show significantly decrease homocysteine level individual hyperhomocysteinemia L-dopa therapy ( Lamberti et al. , 2005 ) . Miller show individual receive L-dopa therapy significantly reduce level B6 yet normal cysteine level . Vitamin B6 coenzyme glutathione synthesis cysteine . However , vitamin B6 ( pyridoxine hydrochloride ) supplementation observe population therefore investigator supplement B6 well B12 Folic Acid . In addition B vitamin , exercise strength train show low homocysteine level ( Vincent , Bourguignon , & Vincent , 2006 ) increase rest GSH ( Elokda & Nielsen , 2007 ) . Elevated homocysteine correlate decrease glutathione level ( Mosharov , Cranford , & Banerjee , 2000 ) . Glutathione ( GSH ) , part , form cysteine , cause direct link glutathione homocysteine ( see diagram ) . GSH one powerful antioxidant body . GSH reduce form glutathione act main defense Reactive Oxygen Species ( ROS ) Free Radicals ( FR ) . ROS contribute initiation many disease ( Viguie et al. , 1993 ) . Glutathione disulfide ( GSSG ) oxidize form GSH . Typically , GSH GSSG measure ratio ( GSH : GSSG ) blood help give immediate understanding antioxidant status body ( Elokda & Nielsen , 2007 ; Viguie et al. , 1993 ) . Individuals PD low level GSH rest non-PD low level GSH directly correlate severity disease ( Bharath & Andersen , 2005 ; Maher , 2005 ) . The current experiment seek determine individual PD benefit supplementation vitamin B6 ( pyridoxine hydrochloride ) , B12 ( cyanocobalamin ) , folic acid , benefit 6-week circuit training program , benefit combination two intervention . The outcome variable include : plasma homocysteine , GSH : GSSG ratio , cognitive function , balance , strength , functional activity , kinematic gait analysis , quality life questionnaire . The investigator hypothesize typically low GSH level higher homocysteine level people PD normalize supplement B6 , B12 , folate , thus reduce oxidative stress offering protection ROS . The investigator hypothesize circuit training reduce homocysteine level increase glutathione level . Furthermore , investigator expect intervention improve functional measure gait balance well improve scale measure quality life depression . Twenty-four sedentary volunteer diagnose PD recruit study ( power analysis .80 level ) . All subject 50 80 year old rat Hoehn Yahr scale level 2 . Subjects age gender match . Each subject perform treadmill exercise tolerance test , take peak exercise . Peak exercise define 90 % target heart rate , RPE 9 , subject unable maintain pace treadmill , anaerobic threshold attain . Additionally , American College Sports Medicine ( ACSM ) guideline terminate exercise testing follow . During exercise test , heart rate ( HR ) , VO2 , RER , VCO2 EKG tracing record 1-minute interval ; BP RPE record within second third minute stage . Vital sign , RPE MET level also record termination exercise . 3 cc blood drawn immediately post exercise ( within 3 minute ) . The blood frozen store lab . Functional Measures Lower body functional testing measure stand-up go time test ( Chair Stand Test ) ( Rikli,1999 ) . Participants ask stand chair return sit position . They ask perform many time 30 second period . It demonstrate tester first give one practice stand . There one 30 trial total number complete sit stand score . Gait measure kinematic analysis use seven-camera ( 60 Hz ) Peak Performance Motus 2000 Real-Time System ( Peak Performance Technologies , Inc. , Englewood , Colorado ) . Using modified Helen Hayes Marker Set , passive reflective marker place throughout body allow precise measurement gait ( Kadaba , Ramakrishnan , & Wootten , 1990 ) . Subjects ask walk 10m along straight , smooth , paint concrete path . The tester demonstrate , subject perform three trial seat rest 3 min trial . Balance test use SMART Balance Master System ( NeuroCom International , Inc. , Clackamas , Oregon ) . Protocols use include Sensory Organization Test , Motor Control Test , Limits Stability Test Unilateral Stance Test ( Bronte-Stewart , Minn , Rodrigues , Buckley , & Nashner , 2002 ) . Muscle strength test joint individual CYBEX machine . Leg Extension , Leg Press , Leg Curl , Hip Adduction/Abduction , Rear Row , Chest Fly , Arm Curl , Seated Dip . A one repetition maximum use one trial modality . The tester perform exercise first demonstrate . The subject ask lift much weight possible one time . A 3-minute rest period give machine . Quality life measure use Parkinson 's Disease Questionnaire 39 ( PDQ-39 ) ( Marinus , 2008 ) . Psychosocial cognitive function measure use SCOPA-PS questionnaire ( Marinus , Visser , Martinez-Martin , van Hilten , & Stiggelbout , 2003 ) . Each subject complete questionnaire prior study complete study . Intervention Blood sample , urine sample 1 RM ( ACSM Guidelines ) measure exercise stress test , day morning fasting . Subjects come second day perform Gait analysis , balance testing , functional testing fill PDQ-39 SCOPA questionnaire . Each participant randomly assign one four group . Aerobic exercise training weight training ( AWT ) , AWT B vitamin supplementation ( AWT+B ) , B vitamin supplementation training ( BS ) , control group ( C ) . The exercise training session 40 minute duration three time per week . They consist 20 minute aerobic train either use treadmill elliptical cross trainer . Since HR accurate tool determine exercise intensity subject PD , participant monitor maintain HR consistent V02 60-70 % max V02 determine initial GXT . Weight train consist seven CYBEX resistance exercise machine . These include leg extension , leg curl , leg press , hip abduction , latissimus dorsi pulldown , chest fly , seat dip . Each participant perform 1 repetition maximum piece equipment record measure pre-training strength . The investigator use 50 % -80 % 1 RM perform 1 set 8-15 repetition per exercise 30 rest period set exercise ( Elokda & Nielsen , 2007 ; Vincent et al. , 2006 ) ( ACSM ) . The group go supplement give 5 mg/day Folate , 2000 mcg/day cyanocobalamin ( oral B12 ) ( Butler et al. , 2006 ; Lamberti et al. , 2005 ) 25 mg/day B6 ( Malouf & Grimley Evans , 2003 ) .
DOC.criteria: Medical clearance perform exercise tolerance test training program . A diagnosis PD stage 2 Hoehn Yahr scale . A neurological condition PD/ Anyone currently take vitamin supplementation . Smokers . Anyone currently engage weight training .
